document.full_text: a satirical broadway show about mormons by the creators of tv series "south park" earned 12 nominations from the drama desk on friday, as it announced its picks for the best plays and musicals of the year.
document.title: satirical mormon musical leads drama desk noms
lines_and_colors: a satirical broadway show about mormons by the creators of tv series "south park" earned 12 nominations from the drama desk on friday, as it announced its picks for the best plays and musicals of the year.
